creator: ramil.israfilov@aditel.be
text:
After saving excel file with existing macros problem occurs.
There is no exception during saving, but if you open file in MSExcel 2000 there 
is an error: "File error: data may have been lost" and macros execution fails.
I used dev-10 release during tests. 
Source excel file and test source code attached to message

This bugs look similar as bug 18155 
(excel error message is the same: 'file error:data may have been lost')
but the macro is a little different here, causing the same error
creator: tony.nys@aditel.be
